title: Senior Backend Engineer - Stockholm
description:
**Vill du göra skillnad genom att utnyttja dina tekniska färdigheter för att skapa innovativa betallösningar?**  

  

Avarda är ett ledande leverantör av white-label betalnings- och finansieringslösningar för företag inom olika branscher. Med fokus på att förenkla betalningsprocessen och förbättra kundupplevelsen möjliggör Avarda för 250 företag att blomstra i den snabbt föränderliga digitala miljön med sitt avancerade äkta white label-erbjudande för betalningar. Vi hanterar årligen 4 miljoner konsumenter och 16 miljarder SEK i volym från miljontals transaktioner.


På Avarda har du chansen att vara en del av en spännande resa där vi bygger en toppmodern plattform som förändrar hur e-handlare hanterar betalningar. Som **Senior Backend Engineer** kommer du att ha en nyckelroll i design och utveckling av våra backend-system med fokus på skalbarhet och prestanda.  

  

**Varför ska du joina oss?**  

Vi erbjuder mer än bara en teknisk utmaning – du blir en del av ett team som bygger framtidens betallösningar med modern och enhetlig teknik. Hos oss kan du växa både tekniskt och personligt, då vi formar starkare arbetsprocesser och utvecklar innovativa lösningar för framtida produkter. Vi bygger en modern plattform som stöder både befintliga och framtida produkter, och du kommer att vara med och skapa en starkare företagskultur och effektivare arbetssätt.  

  

Vår backend-plattform är baserad på **.NET** stack och **mikrotjänst-architektur**, huvudsakligen driftad i **Azure**.  



  

Vi har ett distribuerat teknikteam med medarbetare i Borås, Stockholm, Gdansk, Malaga samt en partner i Tjeckien. Våra betal- och korttjänster används på 13 europeiska marknader, och resor kan förekomma.

 **Dina ansvarsområden:**

  

* Designa, utveckla och drifta mikrotjänster och deras arkitektur med .NET Core.
* Arbeta med molnbaserade lösningar och säkerställ robusta och tillförlitliga Cloud Native tjänster i Azure.
* Säkerställa kontinuerlig integration, leverans och distribution med Kubernetes, Docker och Azure Pipelines.
* Optimera system och applikationer för hög prestanda och tillförlitlighet.
* Implementera logging och observability med OpenTelemetry.
* Coacha juniora utvecklare och delta aktivt i tekniska och arkitektoniska beslut.
* Hålla dig uppdaterad om nya teknologier och föreslå innovativa lösningar.

**Vi tror att du har:**

  

* Minst 5 års erfarenhet av mjukvaruutveckling, särskilt inom C#, .NET Core, och Azure.
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av att arbeta med transaktionsintensiva system och agila utvecklingsprocesser.
* Djup kompetens inom systemarkitektur, med erfarenhet av att designa och underhålla mikrotjänster.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med distribuerade team och integration av komplexa tekniska system.
* Flytande svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.
* Genuint intresse för teknik
* Erfarenhet inom e-handel, betalningslösningar eller finans är meriterande, samt kännedom om system som Corniche, Mambu eller liknande.

title: Mjukvaruarkitekt
description:
**Varför detta jobb är något för dig**


Du gillar att bygga stabila och skalbara system och vill gärna vara den som håller i hela arkitekturen. Du är intresserad av att förstå tekniska lösningar på djupet men också att i helheten kunna se varför en viss teknik är rätt för att möte kundens behov. Med oss på Knightec kommer du få arbeta med verktyg som C#, React, CosmosDB, GraphQL och vi är lika nyfikna som du på att hitta nya vägar och lösningar. Om du dessutom gillar att stötta och inspirera andra tekniskt och socialt, då tror vi att du kommer att passa perfekt.

**Vad du kommer att göra**

* Designa och ansvara för lösningsarkitektur i projekt – från idé till färdig lösning.
* Samarbeta tätt med kunder för att förstå deras behov och hjälpa dem att bygga stabila system.
* Vara en mentor för teamet och guida i tekniska val och arbetssätt.
* Bli en viktig del av våra projekt där du både tänker strategiskt och arbetar praktiskt.
* Driva teknisk utveckling och främja innovation inom teamet.

**Vem vi tror att du är**

* Minst fem års erfarenhet som utvecklare med god förståelse för både PC- och webbaserade miljöer.
* God kunskap inom exempelvis C#, React, CosmosDB, GraphQL och Azure – men viktigast är att veta när och varför de ska användas.
* Van vid att arbeta i en snabbföränderlig bransch och motiverad att hålla dig uppdaterad.
* Nyfiken och med ett driv att utveckla och förbättra dig själv, ditt team och de lösningar du ansvarar för.

**Vad vi erbjuder**


På Knightec får du en arbetsplats där samarbete, innovation och personlig utveckling står i fokus. Vi tror starkt på att ge våra medarbetare frihet att växa och utvecklas mot sina professionella mål genom en variation av spännande projekt och uppdrag.


Oavsett om du arbetar på vårt kontor i Örnsköldsvik eller i Umeå, kommer du att vara en del av ett engagerat team som stöttar varandra i att lösa tekniska utmaningar och skapa hållbara lösningar. Vi tror på värdet i att ta en kaffe tillsammans på kontoret och snickesnacka runt tekniska problem eller fritidsintressen. Om du också gillar att hänga med och cykla MTB, kolla på Formel 1 eller baka tyska kringlor så kan det här bli hur bra som helst!

**En spännande resa med Knightec Group**


Vi på Knightec går nu samman med vårt systerbolag Semcon och bildar **Knightec Group**. Tillsammans blir vi den ledande aktören i norra Europa inom produkt- och digital tjänsteutveckling – hur häftigt är inte det? Vårt gemensamma erbjudande blir både bredare och djupare, vilket gör att vi kan ta oss an stora, strategiska kundprojekt på högsta nivå av innovation och komplexitet. För våra medarbetare innebär detta fantastiska möjligheter till kompetensutveckling och karriärvägar. Låter detta som platsen för dig? Häng med oss på denna spännande resa!

title: IT-Specialist
description:
**Är du en IT-specialist som söker nästa steg i karriären? Vill du arbeta i en dynamisk och innovativ miljö där teknik står i fokus? Då kan detta vara rätt möjlighet för dig!**


Vi på Sortera Group söker nu en driven och kunnig IT-specialist för att förstärka vårt IT-team och bidra till vår framgång inom IT, Tech och digitalisering. Som en del av vårt team får du möjlighet att arbeta med den senaste tekniken och vara en del av spännande projekt.

**Om rollen**


Du kommer att spela en central roll i att säkerställa att våra IT-system fungerar effektivt och stödjer verksamhetens mål. Tillsammans med övriga inom IT-teamet samt våra partners bidrar du till att underhålla och utveckla våra system och IT-lösningar för säkra och effektiva leveranser.


Vill du bidra med din kompetens i en bransch som gör skillnad? Läs vidare för att ta reda på mer om rollen!

**Arbetsuppgifter**

  

Som IT-Specialisthos Sortera Group spelar du en nyckelroll i vårt åtagande att leverera exceptionell service till våra kunder samtidigt som vi bidrar till en mer hållbar framtid.


Du kommer också att:

* Ansvara för on- och offboarding av användare, inklusive hantering av Active Directory och användartillgångar
* Underhålla och optimera våra IT-system, samt säkerställa dataintegritet, hög prestanda och tillgänglighet
* Hantera och optimera våra molntjänster, främst Microsoft Azure, samt on-prem-lösningar tillsammans med våra IT-partners
* Felsöka och lösa IT-relaterade problem som användarna upplever, samt ge användarstöd och säkerställa välfungerande extern IT-support (1st line)
* Ansvara för hantering av telefoni och interna beställningsflöden för IT-resurser
* Sköta IT-drift, nätverk och infrastruktur, tillsammans med IT-partners, för att säkerställa hög tillgänglighet och säkerhet
* Delta i och driva IT-projekt, inklusive utveckling och införande av nya IT-stöd och processer för att förbättra verksamhetens effektivitet
* Implementera och följa upp IT-policyer och procedurer för att säkerställa säkerhet och regelefterlevnad
* Ge stöd i upphandlingar och inköp av IT-utrustning och kontorsteknik
* Samarbeta med andra avdelningar för att identifiera behov och implementera tekniska lösningar som stödjer verksamhetens mål

**Kan du vara en perfekt match för oss?**

  

För att vara framgångsrik i denna roll ser vi att du har:

* En examen inom IT, datavetenskap eller ett relaterat område
* Erfarenhet av arbete med IT-support, användarhantering och systemunderhåll/-hantering/-utveckling eller motsvarande
* Kunskaper inom nätverk, molntjänster (särskilt Azure), samt hantering av Active Directory
* Kunskap om säkerhetslösningar och brandväggar samt databashantering / SQL är meriterande
* Erfarenhet av att leda och delta i IT-projekt är meriterande

**Personliga egenskaper:**

* Problemlösande och analytisk tänkande
* God kommunikationsförmåga, både muntligt och skriftligt (primärt svenska, men även engelska)
* Serviceinriktad och lyhörd för användarnas behov
* Förmåga att arbeta självständigt såväl som i team
* Flexibel och anpassningsbar till förändringar i teknik och arbetsuppgifter

  

**En långsiktig karriär - vi kommer att ge dig:**

  

* Grundlig introduktion i våra olika bolag och våra tjänster
* Du kommer att lära känna våra olika avdelningar med erfarna kollegor
* Erfaren kollega som fadder
* Kunniga och varma, kollegor som har roligt tillsammans
* En positiv företagskultur
* Goda möjligheter att växa
* Pensionsavsättningar och försäkringar etc. enligt kollektivavtal
* Fina, varma, omtänksamma kollegor som har roligt tillsammans


Du utgår från vårt kontor i Marievik och rapporterar direkt till vår IT Lead Jonas, som ansvarar för vår enhet IT Services & Operations. I teamet har du flera fantastiska kollegor att bolla med. Din närmaste chef har många års erfarenhet av IT, ledarskap och har varit på Sortera i flera år.  

  

Har vi lyckats inspirera dig till att söka rollen som **IT-specialist**? Vi hoppas det! Skicka in din ansökan redan idag, urval sker löpande. Start enligt överenskommelse.


Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!

title: Software Engineer
description:
**Are you passionate about digital transformation and eager to work on groundbreaking projects in the legal tech space? Do you want to be a part of a motivated, innovative team that is transforming the future of legal services? Here's your chance!**

### **About PONS**


PONS is an AI-powered legal platform transforming the legal services market by bridging the gap between legal assistance providers and receivers. We aim to work around the clock to make legal work more accessible and affordable while creating more opportunities for legal professionals.


We have a relentless ambition and commitment to leveraging cutting-edge technology to transform the future of legal services. PONS is making strides in the legal market by making legal services more accessible, efficient, and affordable. We are excited to continue our journey, driven by the mission that the future of legal services is here, and it is powered by PONS.


Join us and be a part of a team that is making a difference in the legal world. We are looking for passionate, talented individuals who are ready to take on exciting challenges and contribute to our mission. Together, we can transform the future of legal services.

### **The Role**


Are you a versatile software engineer with expertise in both backend and frontend development? Do you thrive in dynamic environments and possess a deep understanding of Python and TypeScript? PONS is seeking a highly skilled and dedicated **Software Engineer** to develop and maintain our innovative legal tech platform. If you are an ambitious, problem-solving individual with experience in cloud technologies and a knack for leveraging AI to enhance workflows, we want you on our team!

### **Responsibilities and Tasks**

* **Full-Stack Development:** Design, develop, and maintain web applications using Python for backend and TypeScript for frontend.
* **Cloud Infrastructure:** Architect, deploy, and manage applications on cloud platforms such as AWS or Azure, ensuring scalability, security, and reliability.
* **AI Integration:** Implement and optimize Large Language Models (LLMs) and other AI techniques to enhance application functionalities.
* **API Development:** Design and develop robust APIs to facilitate seamless integration between various services and components.
* **Collaboration:** Work closely with cross-functional teams including product managers, designers, and other engineers to deliver high-quality software solutions.
* **Code Quality:** Ensure code quality through best practices, code reviews, testing, and continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines.
* **Innovation:** Stay updated with the latest industry trends and technologies, and proactively suggest improvements to existing systems and processes.
* **Troubleshooting:** Identify, diagnose, and resolve complex technical issues in a timely manner.

### **Required Qualifications**

* **Education:** Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field. Master’s degree preferred.
* **Experience:**
	+ Strong proficiency in Python, TypeScript, and NodeJS.
	+ Experience with cloud platforms, like AWS or Azure.
	+ Knowledge of SQL and NoSQL databases.
	+ Familiarity with AI and machine learning integrations.
	+ Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
* **Skills:**
	+ In-depth knowledge of software development best practices.
	+ Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.
	+ Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
	+ Ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced, global team environment.
* **AI Proficiency:**
	+ Demonstrated ability to effectively prompt and utilize AI tools to enhance workflows and productivity.

### **Preferred Skills**

  

* Experience with IaaS, containerization and orchestration (Docker, Kubernetes).
* Familiarity with DevOps practices and tools (CI/CD pipelines, Terraform, etc.).
* Knowledge of cybersecurity best practices.
* Previous experience in the legal technology sector or understanding of legal services workflows.
* Contributions to open-source projects or a strong personal portfolio.

### **What We Offer**

* A young, motivated, and technology-driven team.
* Opportunities for professional growth and continuous learning.
* Flexible working hours and remote work options.
* A collaborative and supportive work environment.
* Competitive compensation and benefits package.

title: IT Auditor
company_industry: Computer and Network Security and Financial Services
description:
**Vi söker en IT-revisor/Projektledare inom Cybersäkerhet på Seadot Cybersecurity!** 




  





**Introduktion** 




 Är du redo att ta nästa steg i din karriär inom revision och cybersäkerhet? Seadot Cybersecurity erbjuder en spännande möjlighet för dig som vill vara en del av vårt växande team. Som IT-revisor och projektledare kommer du att arbeta med en bred portfölj av kunder inom olika sektorer, säkerställa att företag följer centrala certifieringsstandarder och leda implementeringen av cybersäkerhetstjänster på den nordiska marknaden.
 



 Hos oss får du chansen att kombinera revision och riskhantering med ledarskap och projektledning i en dynamisk och internationell miljö. Vi är en del av den ledande revisionsfirman Securance i Nederländerna, vilket ger oss tillgång till internationell expertis och erkända arbetsmetoder inom IT-revision och riskhantering.
 



  





  





**Dina ansvarsområden** 



* Genomföra IT-revisioner och säkerställa efterlevnad av viktiga certifieringsstandarder som ISAE 3402, ISAE 3000 och ISO 27001.
* Leda projekt och ansvara för en egen kundportfölj, med fokus på att uppfylla kundernas mål och behov.
* Samarbeta med både det svenska teamet och våra kollegor i Nederländerna för att implementera och förbättra revisionsprocesser och säkerställa effektiv riskhantering.
* Utbilda och stötta revisions- och cybersäkerhetsteamet för att uppnå höga standarder och kvalitet.



  





  





**Kvalifikationer** 
 Vi söker dig som har:
 


* Minst två års erfarenhet av revision, riskhantering eller projektledning.
* Utbildning: Minst en kandidatexamen inom ekonomi, systemvetenskap, IT/datavetenskap eller liknande område. Relevanta certifieringar som CISA, ISO 27001 Lead Auditor eller liknande är meriterande.
* Utmärkta kunskaper i svenska och engelska, både skriftligt och muntligt.
* Förmåga att självständigt driva projekt och utredningar från planering till rapportering.
* Erfarenhet av att leda team och projekt, med starka organisatoriska och analytiska färdigheter.
* Ett starkt intresse för att utvecklas inom revision, IT-säkerhet och projektledning.



  





  





**Vi erbjuder** 



* **Omfattande utbildning** 
 : Du får en inledande utbildningsperiod på plats i Nederländerna, där du lär dig av internationella experter och får insikt i beprövade arbetsmetoder inom IT-revision och cybersäkerhet.
* **Karriärmöjligheter** 
 : Stora möjligheter till personlig och professionell utveckling, med chans till avancemang till mer seniora roller inom revision och cybersäkerhet.
* **Ledarskap och ansvar** 
 : Du får leda implementeringen av internationellt erkända arbetsmetoder på den nordiska marknaden och vara en nyckelspelare i att etablera vår verksamhet.
* **Internationell erfarenhet** 
 : Regelbundna resor till Nederländerna och potentiellt andra internationella destinationer.
* **Stöttande teamkultur** 
 : En dynamisk arbetsmiljö där samarbete och kunskapsdelning står i fokus.



  





  





**Om Seadot Cybersecurity** 




 Seadot Cybersecurity är ett växande företag som erbjuder cybersäkerhetstjänster till organisationer med höga krav på efterlevnad och säkerhet. Tillsammans med Securance har vi tillgång till internationell expertis och erbjuder högkvalitativa tjänster inom revision och riskhantering. Hos oss kommer du att spela en central roll i att etablera och implementera cybersäkerhetsprocesser och bidra till att höja standarden på den svenska marknaden.
 



  





**Plats** 




 Tjänsten är baserad i Stockholm/Uppsala och innebär regelbundna resor inom Sverige och internationellt, främst till Nederländerna under de första veckorna av din anställning.
 



  





  





**Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!** 




 Vi tillämpar löpande urval, så skicka in din ansökan redan idag. Har du frågor om tjänsten eller rekryteringsprocessen är du välkommen att kontakta Sofie Ax, sofie@seadot.se. Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Quoting and Ordering Manager
description:
***Quoting and Ordering Manager***




  





 Applications are considered on a rolling basis
 



**Location:** 
 Stockholm
 



  





 As a Quoting and Ordering (Q&O) Manager at Arelion, your core mission is to enhance the efficiency and effectiveness of our procurement operations, directly supporting our ability to deliver exceptional service to our customers.
 



  





 You will be key in managing the entire supplier engagement cycle, from identifying procurement needs in collaboration with the Sales and Solution Engineering representatives, to selecting suppliers, requesting and evaluating quotes, and negotiating terms that align with Arelion’s strategic objectives. Your role will be crucial in ensuring that the procurement specifications meet both the quality standards and cost-effectiveness required to maintain Arelion's competitive edge. By effectively managing these responsibilities, you will contribute directly to the timely and successful delivery of services to our customers, ensuring that each Service Order Form (SOF) is meticulously formalized and aligned with the agreed terms and conditions. This role requires a strong analytical approach but also a strategic mindset to influence and drive procurement decisions that impact the company’s success.
 



  




* **Procurement Requirement Identification** 
 : Collaborate with the Deal Team to develop detailed specifications that align with business goals and customer requirements.



  




* **Supplier Identification and Engagement** 
 : Use the validated supplier catalogue provided by the Procurement team to identify potential suppliers whose capabilities and offerings match the specific procurement requirements. Engage these suppliers to initiate the quoting process, ensuring competitive selection.



  




* **Quoting and Evaluation:** 
 Manage the process of sending out requests for procurement quotes to selected suppliers, ensuring clarity in specifications and expected terms. Evaluate received quotes based on critical factors such as price, quality, delivery timelines, and compliance with specifications, selecting the most advantageous offers.



  




* **Negotiation and Finalization:** 
 Conduct negotiations with selected suppliers to achieve the best possible terms, focusing on aspects like price adjustments, service levels, and contract conditions. Ensure that negotiations lead to agreements that meet Arelion’s strategic procurement goals and customer satisfaction criteria.



  




* **Service Order Form (SOF) Preparation and Submission:** 
 Prepare and finalize the Service Order Form based on the negotiated terms, accurately reflecting all agreed-upon specifications and conditions. Submit the SOF to the Customer Delivery team for technical validation and to initiate the delivery process.



  





**Skills & Requirements** 



* Deep understanding of the telecommunications sector, particularly the carrier market.
* Extensive knowledge of vendor capabilities, including detailed understanding of products and services
* High-level of negotiation skills with a proven track record of securing favourable terms.
* Strong analytical skills, capable of conducting complex data analysis to inform strategic decisions.
* Meticulous attention to detail, ensuring accuracy in all aspects of procurement and quoting processes.
* Proficient in IT systems, particularly Salesforce, with the ability to adapt to new technologies quickly.
* Exceptional communication skills, both written and verbal, tailored to a variety of audiences.
* Proven ability as a team player who can also lead and inspire team members.
* Flexible and responsive to the dynamic needs of the business, embracing changes and challenges with a positive attitude.
* Highly proactive and self-motivated, with the ability to operate independently and drive projects to completion.
* Strong decision-making abilities, with a capacity to weigh alternatives and take decisive actions.



  





 Excellent planning and organizing skills, with a systematic approach to managing priorities and deadlines.
 



  





**About the company** 




 From humble beginnings in the early 1990s, we have become connectivity partner of choice to the world’s largest content providers, operators and enterprises. In the past, our network laid the very foundations of the Internet revolution and today it’s enabling digitalization throughout business and society.
 



  





 Arelion, formerly Telia Carrier, is owned by Polhem Infra, a Swedish investment company backed by some of the largest Swedish public pension funds. We started building our network in 1993, when our Autonomous System, AS1299, was allocated, and we’ve grown organically ever since. Our network now stretches 70,000 kms across Europe, North America and Asia and lets you connect directly to more than 2,300 wholesale customers in more than 125 countries. With more than 450 local access partners around the world, we are the backbone of your business, wherever you are.
 



  





*Arelion provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any type without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by relevant local laws.* 




  





**Contact Person** 




 Stéphane Gros
 



 stephane.gros@arelion.com

title: Sektionschef för sektionen Processors HW
company_industry: Defense and Space Manufacturing, Security and Investigations, and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
*Redo att hitta din grej? Testa nytt, utbyt erfarenheter och upptäck vad du verkligen gillar att göra.*
 Din roll
   

  

 Inom sektionen ”Processors HW” så jobbar vi med hjärnan i presentationssystemet i Gripen C/D. Det innebär i korthet att vi ansvarar för flera apparater och delkomponenter i presentationssystemet.
   

  

 Rollen som sektionschef hos oss är operativ och där ingår både personal- och verksamhetsansvar. Du har ansvar för en rad viktiga områden, inklusive arbetsmiljö, kompetensutveckling och ledning av utvecklingsprojekt och studier. Du ansvarar för en sektion bestående av cirka 10 medarbetare med varierande kompetenser, från systemarkitekter till FPGA-utvecklare.
   

  

 Som sektionschef ingår du i områdets ledningsgrupp som täcker presentationssystemet för Gripen C/D samt applikations HMI. I ledningsgruppen arbetar vi både operativt med att styra, leda och rapportera om pågående projekt, samt inte minst med att stötta varandra i frågor som rör personal, arbetssätt och teknikstrategier.
   

  

 Vi erbjuder dig en tjänst som kombinerar ett teknikområde där användaren är i fokus med möjligheten att utvecklas som operativ linjechef. Allt detta i en miljö med trevliga och stöttande medarbetare/chefskollegor där vi har ett gemensamt mål – att vässa Gripens förmåga varje dag!
   

  

 Din profil
   

  

 Vi söker dig som tycker om att jobba operativt och motiveras av att verksamheten uppnår sina mål och leveranser. Du är en prestigelös lagspelare som glatt delar med dig av erfarenheter och kunnande i vår ledningsgrupp. Du engagerar dig gärna i arbetssätt och strategiska frågor liksom i ingenjörernas tekniska utmaningar.
   

  

 För att passa i rollen tror vi att du har:
   

  

* En grundläggande teknisk utbildning (civil-/högskoleingenjör eller motsvarande)
* Minst 3 års erfarenhet som linjechef
* Erfarenhet av FPGA-, HW- och SW-utveckling


 Vi ser det som meriterande om du har:
   

  

* Tidigare erfarenhet av projektledning
* Kunskap om Flygvapnet och/eller Gripen-systemet
* Erfarenhet av att leda i förändring
* Kunskap om verktyg/IT miljöer för utveckling av FPGA/PLD/Elektronik


 Befattningen kräver att du genomgår och godkänns enligt vid var tid gällande bestämmelser för säkerhetsskydd. För befattningar där Saab har krav på säkerhetsklassinplacering kan, i förekommande fall, medföra krav på visst medborgarskap.
   

  

 Vad du blir en del av
   

  

 Bakom våra innovationer finns alla de som har gjort det möjligt. Modiga pionjärer och kluriga tänkare. Vardagshjältar och kreativa problemlösare. De som delar djup kunskap och de som utforskar nya områden. Och alla däremellan.
   

  

 Här har du chansen att påverka och bidra på ditt unika sätt. Allt från att utveckla kod och bygga imponerande försvars- och säkerhetslösningar till att ta en kaffe med en kollega. Varje bidrag räknas. Vi ger dig möjlighet att anta utmaningar och skapa smarta innovationer. I vår vänliga och tekniksmarta värld finns plats för dig att växa. Vi finns här för att tillsammans skapa trygghet för människor och samhällen.
   

  

 Saab är ett ledande försvars- och säkerhetsföretag med uppdrag att hjälpa nationer att skydda sin befolkning och bidrar till trygghet för människor och samhällen. Med 23 000 talangfulla medarbetare utvecklar Saab teknik och lösningar för en säkrare och mer hållbar värld.
   

  

 Saab utvecklar, tillverkar och underhåller avancerade system inom flygteknik, vapen, ledningssystem, sensorer och undervattenssystem. Saab har sitt huvudkontor i Sverige men en global verksamhet där Saab är en del av många nationers försvarsförmåga. Läs mer om oss här
   

  

 Vänligen observera att vi arbetar med löpande urval och tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum har gått ut. Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!

title: Network Security Manager
description:
Company: JSS Associates
 







 Type of Employment: B2B Contract
 







 Client: MNC (Multi National Company)
 







 Location: Stockholm, Sweden
 







 Work Mode: Onsite
 



  





 Required Skills for ADC Role
 



  




* 13+ years of work experience, with at least 7 years in Information Security architecture and management.
* Minimum of 5 years as an IT security expert.



  





**Expert Knowledge:** 



* Extensive knowledge of enterprise IT infrastructure, vulnerability management, and change management, especially in large-scale implementations.
* Familiarity with frameworks such as ISO 2700x, CobiT, NIST, ISF, SOX, etc.
* Knowledge of OWASP, Secure SDLC, CI/CD pipelines, encryption, IAM, data integrity, PKI, etc.



  





**Security Technology & Practices:** 



* Hands-on experience implementing RBAC (Role-Based Access Control) in multi-tenant cloud environments.
* Experience with multi-factor authentication, SSO, and identity management technologies.



  





**Industry Awareness:** 



* Constantly keeping up with the latest security trends to propose best solutions for the business.



  





**Project Management & Communication:** 



* Knowledge of IT Project Management and PMO methodologies.
* Strong communication and business acumen, with the ability to engage with both technical and non-technical stakeholders.



  





**Certifications:** 



* Professional certifications such as CISSP, CISM, or ISO 27001 Auditor/Practitioner.
* Certifications in risk management/audit (CIA, CISA, CRISC) are highly preferred.

title: Solution Advisor Associate - SAP Academy for Customer Success - Sweden (Hybrid)
company_industry: Software Development, IT Services and IT Consulting, and Business Consulting and Services
description:
**We help the world run better**
 At SAP, we enable you to bring out your best. Our company culture is focused on collaboration and a shared passion to help the world run better. How? We focus every day on building the foundation for tomorrow and creating a workplace that embraces differences, values flexibility, and is aligned to our purpose-driven and future-focused work. We offer a highly collaborative, caring team environment with a strong focus on learning and development, recognition for your individual contributions, and a variety of benefit options for you to choose from.
   

  

**The SAP Academy for Customer Success is a talent development program specifically for candidates early in their careers.**
**Who You’ll Become**
 A Solution Advisor works with our customers and prospects to help them solve business challenges and meet their business objectives using SAP solutions. As a part of the sales team, a Solution Advisor is the “subject matter expert” responsible for the functional and technical knowledge within the sales cycle. A Solution Advisor provides deal support by participating in discovery sessions, executive meetings and presentations and will deliver software demonstrations that help the customer understand SAP’s unique value proposition. In addition to deal support, the Solution Advisor will participate in marketing events, will lead Design Thinking sessions, and collaborate with the broader sales team to identify whitespace opportunities at existing accounts.
   

  

 As a Solution Advisor within the SAP Academy for Customer Success, you will be responsible to:
   

  

* Successfully complete a 10-month program that strengthens a foundation for a successful customer-facing career at SAP.
* Participate in experiential learning opportunities with colleagues from all over the world and acquire a wide variety of business, industry and SAP solution skills while working with emerging and cutting-edge technologies.
* Receive on-the-job training under the mentorship of a senior Solution Advisor colleague while working with our customers to gain real world experience and acquire the skills necessary to help guide our customers through their Digital Transformation journey.


 The program will enrich your knowledge of SAP and give you the professional experience to serve our customers. We offer full-time employment from day one with practical learning applications for your role. After successful completion of the program, you are expected to lead customer discovery sessions and survey activities to uncover business challenges and opportunities for innovation. You will create and deliver high impact and engaging software demonstrations that compel the customers to select SAP over other competitive offerings. You will also provide demand generation support through marketing events and deal execution support by responding to request for proposals.
   

  

**Solution Areas Focus**
* SAP Business and Technology Platform (BTP) – Knowledge in database and data management, analytics, application development and integration, intelligent technologies and AI.
* SAP Digital Supply Chain (DSC) - knowledge in Supply Chain, Asset Management, Manufacturing, Warehouse Management, or Transportation Management.


**What You’ll Bring**
* 2-3 years of work experience with a strong foundation in technical and business processes, exposure to relevant technologies/ solutions, and excellent communication, or customer-facing skills.
* Multi-dimensional experience: global experience, leadership role, entrepreneurial/self-starter, volunteerism, music, sports, etc.
* Effective communication skills including fluency in English and local language.
* Proficient interpersonal skills including passion, curiosity, listening skills, professional presence, empathy and “can-get-it-done” mentality.
* Demonstrated ability to collaborate across diverse stakeholders and business functions.
* Strong Business Acumen including demonstrated knowledge of business processes and/or industries.


**About SAP Academy For Customer Success**
 The SAP Academy for Customer Success is a talent development program specifically for candidates early in their careers.
   

  

 The SAP Academy for Customer Success is a world-class training program that develops our next-generation workforce by delivering an energizing and inspiring experience within a globally diverse environment. This dynamic 10-month program strengthens the foundation for a successful career at SAP.
   

  

 Join us for the opportunity of a lifetime, to develop a global peer network, partner and engage with customers to help solve their unique business challenges, and leverage world-class cloud-based products and services, all while earning a great salary and benefits.
   

  

 #SAPAcademyforCustomerSuccess #SAPSolutionAdvisoryProgramG19
   

  

 SAP’s employees across different regions are enabled to do their best job with the right mix of office and remote work according to country-specific guidelines and regulations. In general, our hybrid work setup consists of three days a week in the office or on-site with customers or partners.
   

  

 We are planning a practical and immersive portion of our program, which will have participants spend between 4 and 6 weeks, spread across two trips, in San Ramon, California. This experience is designed to provide unparalleled hands-on learning and networking opportunities. \*Please note that this is still in the planning phase, and the final decision will be confirmed by the first quarter of 2025. We will ensure that this information is communicated promptly and that sufficient time is provided for necessary preparations.
   

  

 During these intensive phases of the program, it is critical that all participants are fully engaged and present to ensure maximum learning and success. As such, vacation will not be approved from March 1, 2025, to May 30, 2025, and then again from August 11, 2025, to October 17, 2025. \*Dates are subject to change as planning is finalized.
   

  

**Bring out your best**
 SAP innovations help more than four hundred thousand customers worldwide work together more efficiently and use business insight more effectively. Originally known for leadership in enterprise resource planning (ERP) software, SAP has evolved to become a market leader in end-to-end business application software and related services for database, analytics, intelligent technologies, and experience management. As a cloud company with two hundred million users and more than one hundred thousand employees worldwide, we are purpose-driven and future-focused, with a highly collaborative team ethic and commitment to personal development. Whether connecting global industries, people, or platforms, we help ensure every challenge gets the solution it deserves. At SAP, you can bring out your best.
   

  

**We win with inclusion**
 SAP’s culture of inclusion, focus on health and well-being, and flexible working models help ensure that everyone – regardless of background – feels included and can run at their best. At SAP, we believe we are made stronger by the unique capabilities and qualities that each person brings to our company, and we invest in our employees to inspire confidence and help everyone realize their full potential. We ultimately believe in unleashing all talent and creating a better and more equitable world.
   

  

 SAP is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to the values of Equal Employment Opportunity and provide accessibility accommodations to applicants with physical and/or mental disabilities. If you are interested in applying for employment with SAP and are in need of accommodation or special assistance to navigate our website or to complete your application, please send an e-mail with your request to Recruiting Operations Team: Careers@sap.com
   

  

 For SAP employees: Only permanent roles are eligible for the SAP Employee Referral Program, according to the eligibility rules set in the SAP Referral Policy. Specific conditions may apply for roles in Vocational Training.
   

  

**EOE AA M/F/Vet/Disability**
 Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to their age, race, religion, national origin, ethnicity, age, gender (including pregnancy, childbirth, et al), sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, protected veteran status, or disability.
   

  

 Successful candidates might be required to undergo a background verification with an external vendor.
   

  

 Requisition ID: 403369 | Work Area: Presales | Expected Travel: 0 - 100% | Career Status: Graduate | Employment Type: Regular Full Time | Additional Locations: .

title: Managing Attorney, Regulatory & Digital Responsibility Northern Europe (R-16814)
Head of Corporate Development (M&A)
description:
Sinch is a Customer Communication Cloud company, directly powering meaningful conversations at scale across messaging, voice and email to help businesses deliver unified, personalized experiences that truly revolve around their customers - no matter the channels they use. More than 150,000 businesses - including many of the world's largest tech companies, rely on us for their customer communication needs.
   

  

 We dream big - for our company, our customers and our employees - and we hire the best talent worldwide to help us bring our vision to life. We have near 4,500 Sinchers in more than 60 countries - probably somewhere near you!
   

  

 Sinch is listed on Nasdaq Stockholm, with revenues exceeding 28 billion SEK and the company has done more than 20 acquisitions since the foundation in 2008.
   

  

 We are looking for an ambitious and dynamic Head of Corporate Development to lead our M&A strategy and play a pivotal role in shaping the future of our business.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As the Head of Corporate Development, you will be responsible for defining and executing our M&A strategy, from identifying potential targets to executing deals and ensuring successful integration. You will work closely with the CFO, CEO, and Board of Directors, presenting and communicating our M&A vision and strategy to senior executives and key stakeholders. Your ability to navigate complex integrations, manage multiple projects efficiently, and build strong relationships both internally and externally will be crucial as we continue to expand and refine our portfolio. We are seeking a leader who can balance strategic vision with hands-on execution in a dynamic, yet supportive work environment.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Lead the M&A Strategy: Develop and implement a focused M&A strategy that aligns with our company's growth objectives, presenting and communicating this strategy to senior executives, including the Board of Directors.
* Acquisition and Divestiture Planning: Identify and evaluate acquisition opportunities with business owners. Lead and support divestiture processes, ensuring non-core assets are sold efficiently and profitably.
* Post-Merger Integration: Collaborate with the integration team to monitor the performance of acquired businesses, supporting alignment across teams to maximize synergies and long-term value.
* Deal Negotiation & Execution: Lead all aspects of deal execution, including negotiations, due diligence, and finalizing agreements, while ensuring alignment with strategic objectives set by the Board.
* Strategic Financing: Collaborate with the Finance team to structure deal financing and maintain a relationship with financial institutions.
* Stakeholder Engagement: Build and nurture strong relationships with internal and external stakeholders, including senior leadership, external advisors, and financial institutions, to facilitate seamless execution of M&A activities.
* Team Leadership: Manage and mentor a talented and ambitious Corporate Development team, promoting a culture of collaboration, innovation, and professional growth.


 This role is based at our HQ in Stockholm, Sweden and reports to our Group CFO.
   

  

**About You**
 To be successful in this role you are a highly skilled M&A professional with a strong track record in driving successful acquisitions and integrations, ideally within the technology sector. You excel in dynamic, growth-oriented environments and bring a collaborative, inclusive approach to leadership. You are strategic yet hands-on, ready to make a tangible impact on our company's growth and success.
   

  

* Extensive experience in M&A and corporate finance, with a proven track record of leading complex transactions. Expertise in managing buy-side and sell-side transactions, including divestitures.
* Demonstrated project management skills, with the ability to oversee and coordinate multiple workstreams simultaneously.
* Proven leadership abilities, with a commitment to fostering team growth, collaboration and development.
* Experience from technology sector, ideally with some exposure to the software industry and its unique dynamics.
* Academic background in Finance, Engineering, or a related field (MBA or M.Sc. preferred), but we equally value proven expertise and a successful track record in M&A and corporate development.


**Our Values**
 At Sinch we "Dream Big", "Win Together", "Keep it simple" and "Make it Happen". These values are our foundation for fostering an environment where diversity of thinking, skills and experiences are embraced, delivering innovation and better business results.
   

  

**Bring your authentic self to Sinch**
 Here at Sinch we embrace diversity and work to create an inclusive workplace where everyone can thrive. No matter who you are, you'll be able to explore new career and growth options - sharing your voice, building your path and making it happen with us.
   

  

 We're proud to be an equal opportunity employer, and all qualified applicants will be considered to join our team regardless of race, color, religion, creed, gender, national origin, age, disability, veteran status, marital status, pregnancy, sex, gender expression or identity, sexual orientation, citizenship, or any other legally protected class.
   

  

**Our Hiring Process**
 At Sinch, we are committed to following a recruitment process that is fair, objective, consistent, and non-discriminatory. We use pre-employment assessment to create an inclusive application experience to help foster diverse and high performing teams.
   

  

 Even if you do not meet all job requirements, don't let that stop you from considering Sinch for the next step in your career. We are always looking for people that could help us pioneer the way the world communicates.
   

  

 If this role isn't what you're looking for, please consider other open roles on our career page: https://www.sinch.com/careers/

title: Test Specialist – Microsoft Dynamics 365
description:
**We are looking for a Test Specialist to support us with different test activities for example verify that acceptance criteria are testable and unambiguous, design testcases/scenarios, execute tests, creating and maintaining regressions test suites, report defects to secure the quality of our new D365 Finance and Operation platform. Focus of work is to automate regression test suits.**


### **Assignment Description**


* To further improve the technical foundation of our Core digital retail offer, we are developing the D365 Finance and Operations platform that will cater for the needs of several business areas.
* To ensure a stable platform we aim to automate tests for various situations.
* You will work with the product and platform teams to understand their needs and requirements and translate this into relevant test cases and integrate them in different environments to secure the quality.
* We expect you to be a part of the teams and guide them in what is possible and feasible to automate and what has to be tested manually to achieve an optimal combination and variation of testing.


**Required Skills**


* Microsoft Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations.
* Test automation tools.
* Test design techniques.
* Skilled to write testcases and tests scripts.
* Estimate, design, develop and execute test cases.
* Verify that acceptance criteria are testable and unambiguous.
* Azure DevOps.
* Experience with other Azure Services.
* Experience with other similar tools and technologies is also of interest.

title: Senior Testare
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.

*I samband med din ansökan kan du komma att presenteras för kund/partner som en del av rekryteringsprocessen. Om du blir utvald för uppdraget, kommer du att anställas av oss och arbeta antingen hos kund eller i interna projekt och åtaganden som en del av vår konsultverksamhet.*

 **Din profil (Skall krav)**  

* API tester, REST
* ReadyAPI (alt. Postman) för funktionella tester
* ReadyAPI (alt. JMeter, LoadRunner eller motsvarande) för prestandatester
* Groovy script
* Programmeringskunskaper generellt
* Azure DevOps (projektplanering, test management) eller liknande verktyg
* Kunskaper kring authentisering, PKI
* Testkompetens, testtekniker, teststrategi utifrån arkitektur och krav, icke funktionella tester (prestanda, tillförlitlighet, användarvänlighet, säkerhet)
* Teoretiska testkunskaper, då det finns ett behov av säker och tydlig kommunikation med olika intressenter, ISTQB Certifiering (gärna flera olika, men minst Foundation)
* Erfarenhar av agila metoder (ex SAFE, Scrum, Kanban)


Erfarenhet av att ha jobbat med Acceptanstester och Prestandatester meriterande  

  

**Sista ansökningdatum:** 22-11-2024

 **Om Deploja**  

  

Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, AI, Machine Learning, Test, Cloud, Infra DevOps, , IT-Projektledning.  

  

Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?

  

Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!

 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.


En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.


Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.


Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.


Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?


Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.

  

Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.


Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?

 *Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.*

title: Managed Services Engineer/Sentinel
description:
About Sinch
  
Sinch is pioneering the way the world communicates. More than 150,000 businesses — including Google, Uber, Paypal, Visa, Tinder, and many others — rely on Sinch’s Customer Communications Cloud to power engaging customer experiences through mobile messaging, voice, and email.
  
Whether you need to verify users or craft omnichannel campaigns, Sinch makes it easy. Our AI-infused Super Network, APIs, and applications ensure you can connect with your customers reliably and securely, at every step of their journey.
  
At Sinch we “Dream Big”, “Win Together”, “Keep it simple”, and “Make it Happen”. These values are our foundation!
  
Description
  
As a Managed Services Engineer, you will be working in a DevOps team responsible for delivering the Sentinel solution & services. The position requires the right blend of technical depth, experience, leadership and process awareness to handle the day-to-day responsibilities.
  
The Sentinel Solution is based on an A2P traffic emulator and analyzer running on a wide number of Mobile Network Operators. The server part is Java based running in AWS and the network probes are running on Android OS.
  
The DevOps Team consists of Developers and Operations Engineers and Administrators handling development, operations & maintenance of the end-to-end solution.
  
Responsibilities
  
* Daily Operation & Maintenance of the Solution. (Including writing and updating scripts and configuring hardware)
* Contribute to the CI/CD pipeline.
* Ensure high availability and service of the service.
* Ability to engage with internal and external stakeholders to ensure great delivieries and address and solve issues.
* Provide feedback for process improvements.


Normal working hours are weekdays, but the role includes that you are available outside normal office hours in case of major emergencies on systems where your expertise are required.
  
To excel in the role, it is important that the candidates have a business mind and see the benefits of business for both the company and its customers.
  
Requirements
  
* Strong analytical skills.
* Demonstrated ability from technical roles within the Telecom / IT industry.
* Scripting capabilities.
* Fluency in written and spoken English.
* Takes initiative and makes carefully considered decisions.
* Technical- and solution oriented.
* Comfortable and experienced in multitasking.
* Well-organized.
* Comfortable and positive in a constantly evolving world.


Good to have
  
* Java Development Background
* Experience in developing in Java


Our Hiring Process
  
We are committed to ensuring a recruitment process that is fair, objective, consistent, and inclusive. Our approach includes structured, competency-based interviews designed to evaluate your skills, experience, and qualifications relevant to the role. At times, we may include a data-driven assessment to enhance our hiring success and identify candidates likely to excel.
  
We believe in a two-way process and encourage you to ask questions throughout the journey. If this role isn't what you're looking for, please explore the other opportunities listed on our career page: https://www.sinch.com/careers/. No matter who you are, we hope you find an exciting path forward - hopefully with us!
company_description: We help companies to communicate with customers via messaging, voice and video using multiple channels. Simplifying life by bringing all people and businesses together using technology is our purpose.

title: ML Team Lead
Product Owner (Swedish Speaking)
description:
Jobbify är en jobbplattform för vassa kandidater.
  
  

För kunds räkning har vi publicerat denna annons, vill du komma i kontakt med den slutgiltiga arbetsgivaren kan du klicka dig vidare till annonsen:
  
  

Join Our Team VIPAS AB as a Product Owner
  
  

Do you have what it takes to thrive in the vibrant world of IT consulting? VIPAS AB, a burgeoning company, proudly invites you to embark on your next engaging project as our
  
  

**About VIPAS :**  

Imagine a world where your business technology perfectly aligns with your goals—efficient, scalable, and innovative. At VIPAS AB, that’s exactly what we strive to create. As an IT consulting company, we don’t just offer services; we deliver tailored solutions using cutting-edge technologies like Java and Python. Our team is well-versed in software development, DevOps, and engineering, bringing years of experience and expertise. Think of us as your trusted guide, leading your organization through the landscape of modern tech adoption, ensuring every step is taken with confidence and foresight.
  
  

**Job Description:**  

The client requires ongoing support for its CRM system based on Microsoft Dynamics and Ungapped to enhance communication and stakeholder tracking across multiple operational branches. A consultant is needed to manage and maintain the system solution.
  
  

**Key Responsibilities:**  

Acting as the contact person for various departments using the CRM system.
  
  

Informing, training, and supporting staff in system usage.
  
  

Performing routine maintenance tasks in the CRM system.
  
  

Configuring, customizing, and developing CRM functionalities with the business.
  
  

Conducting minor development tasks within the CRM system.
  
  

Managing CRM data, including imports, exports, cleaning, and merging.
  
  

Documenting the client’s CRM system and advising on its future development.
  
  

**Mandatory Requirements:**  

Competence Level 4 (9–12 years).
  
  

Specify the consultant's start date availability.
  
  

Documented expertise in Ungapped or similar marketing tools (e.g., newsletters, invitations, events, registration forms, surveys).
  
  

Proficiency in Microsoft Dynamics Power Pages.
  
  

At least 5 years of experience in maintaining (both technically and functionally) CRM systems based on Microsoft Dynamics.
  
  

Fluency in Swedish, both spoken and written.
  
  

**Preferred Requirements:**  

At least 3 years of experience in management or development projects within the communication domain.
  
  

At least 3 years of experience leading development or management projects at a university or higher education institution.
  
  

At least 3 years of experience in vendor management within IT.
  
  

At least 3 years of experience leading development or management projects within government agencies.
  
  

**Reference Assignments:**  

To verify experience, the consultant must provide references from at least two external clients with similar size and complexity projects.
  
  

Provide details of at least two (2) projects completed in the last seven (7) years with a detailed project description.
  
  

Include current contact information for the references (company name, contact name, title, email, and phone number).
  
  

Why Join Us?
  
  

Vipas AB offers attractive employment packages for IT consultants, aligned with the Teknikföretagen (Almega) collective agreement. Clients Working with us provides opportunities in diverse industries, allowing you flexibility and growth. If you’re driven and eager to face new challenges, join the VIPAS family.
  
  

You'll be part of an innovative team driving the future of telecom, Automotive, Retail, and Banking. If you're ready to take on challenging projects and grow your career in a cutting-edge environment, this is the opportunity for you!
  
  

Apply Now & Please feel free to reach me at priyanka@vipas.se & contact me at +46727749222
  
  

**Note:** Please do apply if you have Sweden PR/ citizenship OR a Sweden work permit.
  
  

**How to Apply:**  

Interested candidates are encouraged to apply by submitting their resume and cover letter. Join us in driving innovation in the VIPAS AB!
  
  

Please note! We offer continuously. That means that we sometimes remove the assignments before the deadline. If you are interested we recommend that you apply immediately.

title: Test Engineer – Malmö
description:
We are currently seeking an experienced Test Engineer (manual tester with test automation skills) for an assignment with our client.
  
  

**Background:**  

We are looking for a positive team player who is passionate about creating value and is comfortable taking the lead from a technical perspective. You should feel confident in participating in quality assurance and related areas, including modern integration principles and methods.
  
We believe you are someone who can work in uncertainty and thrives in a fast-paced environment. You have a proven ability to bring structure to complex environments, are comfortable making decisions, and inspire others to follow your leadership while applying best practices and work methods.
  
You work in an action-oriented manner, translating strategy into operational actions to drive things forward within the organization. Your curiosity allows you to actively acquire new knowledge and skills, using them to drive new methods and processes that improve workflows and deliveries.
  
  

**Scope of the Assignment:**  

In this role, you will assist the client with various testing activities, such as:
  
– Ensuring that acceptance criteria are testable and unambiguous.
  
– Designing test cases and scenarios.
  
– Executing tests and creating/maintaining regression test suites.
  
– Reporting defects to ensure the quality of the new D365 Finance and Operations platform.
  
  

**Preferred Technologies & Skills:**  

– Microsoft Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations
  
– Test automation tools
  
– Test design techniques
  
– Skilled in writing test cases and test scripts
  
– Ability to estimate, design, develop, and execute test cases
  
– Ensuring that acceptance criteria are testable and unambiguous
  
– Azure DevOps
  
– Experience with other Azure Services
  
– Experience with other similar tools and technologies is also of interest.
  
  

**Main Tasks in the Assignment:**  

As part of the team working on the Core digital retail offering, you will help improve the technical foundation by developing the D365 Finance and Operations platform, catering to several business areas. To ensure a stable platform, the focus will be on automating tests for various scenarios.
  
You will collaborate with product and platform teams to understand their needs and requirements, translating them into relevant test cases. These test cases will be integrated into different environments to ensure quality. You will guide the teams on what is feasible and optimal to automate and what needs to be manually tested, ensuring the best possible balance of testing.
  
**Start Date:** ASAP
  
**End Date:** March 31, 2025 (likely to be extended)
  
**Location:** Malmö
  
**Workload:** Full-time (100%)
  
**Remote:** Yes, but expected to work onsite 2-3 days a week.
  
We will be reviewing candidates on an ongoing basis for this assignment, so please apply as soon as possible.
  
  

**Required Skills:**  

– Test Cases
  
– MS D365 F&O
  
– Microsoft Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations
  
– Test Design
  
– Azure Services
  
– Azure DevOps
  
– Test Automation Tools
  
– Test Scripts
  
– Acceptance Criteria
  
**Languages:** English (Fluent/Expert)

title: Testspecialist
description:
*Vi söker en erfaren testspecialist med kunskap inom testautomation och testdata för att arbeta med implementeringen av en ny försäkringsplattform baserad på GuideWire. Du kommer att arbeta med autonoma tjänster och systemintegration i en agil miljö.*  

*Läs vidare om du är intresserad av att arbeta med moderna tekniker och ha roligt på jobbet!*  


**Om jobbet**
Vi söker en driven och engagerad testspecialist som vill vara med och forma framtiden inom testautomation. Hos oss blir du en del av ett team som ansvarar för utvecklings- och kravmetodik, integrationer, verktyg, kvalitetssäkring och releaseprocesser.  

I denna roll kommer du att spela en nyckelroll i att stödja våra utvecklingsteam och arbeta nära dem för att definiera teststrategier och implementera best practices. Du kommer att vara en viktig del av vårt arbete med att säkerställa hög kvalitet och effektivitet i våra processer. Du kommer att arbeta i ett internationellt team där du tar eget ansvar för att leverera systemlösningar baserade på affärskrav. Dessutom kommer du att bli en expert på vårt testramverk och dess integrationer.  


 Dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter kommer att vara:
* Skapa förutsättningar för testautomation och vidareutveckla vårt testramverk.
* Underhålla och drifta vårt testramverk samt leverera testdata.
* Bygga automatiserade testskript.
* Optimera vår testmiljö.
  


Verktyg och tekniker du kommer att använda inkluderar:
* BDD med Cucumber/JBehave.
* Databaser och SQL.
* Prestandatester med Neoload eller liknande verktyg.
* API-testning med ReadyAPI/Postman samt verktyg för generering av testdata.
* Docker och OpenShift Cluster.
* Azure DevOps för testhantering, CI/CD och releaseprocesser.

  


**Vem är du?**
För att vara framgångsrik i denna roll ser vi att du har följande:
* Minst 10 års erfarenhet av utveckling och testautomation, inklusive integration av automatiserade tester i CI/CD-pipelines.
* Kunskap om agila metoder som Lean, Scrum och SAFe samt programmeringsspråket Java.
* Erfarenhet av verktyg som Selenium, ReadyAPI/Postman, Jenkins eller Azure DevOps, samt databaser.
* Erfarenhet av Git Branching och Git command, samt testdata genereringsverktyg.
* Erfarenhet av Docker och OpenShift Cluster, samt prestandatester med Neoload eller liknande verktyg.
* Erfarenhet av försäkringsbranschen.
* Erfarenhet av Guidewire är ett plus.

  


Vi söker en nyfiken och social lagspelare som är lösningsorienterad och trivs med att arbeta nära både affären och andra utvecklare. Du gillar att bygga en stark gemenskap på jobbet, är bra på att kommunicera, lyssna och ställa frågor, och du är inte rädd för att ta initiativ.  

Om du brinner för kvalitet och vill vara med på en resa där du verkligen kan göra skillnad, då är detta möjligheten för dig!  


**Om oss**
Du kommer att vara en del av vårt agila team inom SAFe-ramverket, där eget ansvar och initiativ värderas högt. Vi fokuserar starkt på testautomation och testdata för att säkerställa hög kvalitet och effektivitet. I denna roll får du möjlighet att forma och optimera vårt testramverk samt bidra till att skapa smidiga och produktionslika testmiljöer.  

Vi tror på att ha roligt på jobbet, och jag som din chef kommer att vara stöttande och engagerad. Du kommer också att ha ett stort nätverk av kontakter med andra team och IT-leveransfunktioner, inklusive IT-säkerhet och infrastruktur.  


Välkommen till Affärsenhet Sak inom Länsförsäkringar AB! Vi ansvarar för service och utveckling av länsförsäkringsgruppens sakförsäkringsaffär samt för att starta och driva ny affär. Enheten kompletterar länsförsäkringsbolagens erbjudande med specialprodukter, gemensamma koncept och erbjudanden, samt ansvarar för kundkommunikation och digital marknadsföring.  


**Mer information**
*Låter det spännande?* *Då vill vi veta mer om dig! Välkommen med din ansökan redan idag. Vi arbetar löpande med denna rekrytering och kan komma att tillsätta tjänsten innan sista ansökningsdag.*  


**Sista ansökningsdag:** **2024-12-10**
  
Kort om tjänsten


**Anställningsform:** Tillsvidare
**Arbetsplats:** Stockholm
**Chef:** Kaj Holmberg
**Kontaktuppgifter:** kaj.holmberg@lansforsakringar.se
Vill du vara en del av lösningen, när livet förändras?


Bli en del av något större och börja jobba hos oss. En karriär hos Länsförsäkringar handlar lika mycket om att vara en hjälpande hand för våra kunder genom alla livets skeenden som att stärka lokalsamhället där du verkar.

title: Head of Cloud & Security
description:
Are you passionate about digital transformation and eager to work on groundbreaking projects in the legal tech space? Do you want to be a part of a motivated, innovative team that is transforming the future of legal services? Here's your chance!

### **About PONS**


PONS is an AI-powered legal platform transforming the legal services market by bridging the gap between legal assistance providers and receivers. We aim to work around the clock to make legal work more accessible and affordable while creating more opportunities for legal professionals.


We have a relentless ambition and commitment to leveraging cutting-edge technology to transform the future of legal services. PONS is making strides in the legal market by making legal services more accessible, efficient, and affordable. We are excited to continue our journey, driven by the mission that the future of legal services is here, and it is powered by PONS.


Join us and be a part of a team that is making a difference in the legal world. We are looking for passionate, talented individuals who are ready to take on exciting challenges and contribute to our mission. Together, we can transform the future of legal services.

**The Role**


PONS is seeking a highly skilled and dedicated **Head of Cloud & Security** to oversee our cloud infrastructure and ensure the security and integrity of our platform. If you are an ambitious, strategic thinker with a deep understanding of cloud technologies and cybersecurity, we want you on our team!

 **Responsibilities and Tasks**

* Lead the design, implementation, and maintenance of PONS's cloud infrastructure on Azure. Oversee the deployment and management of Kubernetes clusters and Docker containers. Ensure the scalability, reliability, and performance of cloud-based applications and services.
* Develop and enforce comprehensive security policies, procedures, and protocols. Conduct regular security assessments, vulnerability scans, and penetration testing. Implement and manage security measures to protect against cyber threats and data breaches.
* Manage monitoring tools to ensure system health and performance. Optimize cloud resources for cost-efficiency and performance. Analyze system metrics and logs to identify and resolve issues proactively.
* Oversee the development and maintenance of CI/CD pipelines to ensure seamless deployment processes. Collaborate with DevOps teams to integrate security best practices into the development lifecycle.
* Manage and secure integration of AI technologies within the platform.
* Lead and mentor a team of cloud engineers and security professionals. Collaborate with other departments to integrate security into all aspects of the platform. Foster a culture of continuous improvement and security awareness within the organization.
* Develop and implement incident response plans. Lead the response to security incidents, including investigation, mitigation, and reporting.
* Ensure compliance with relevant industry standards and regulations, such as ISO27001:2022, SOC & GDPR. Maintain up-to-date knowledge of cybersecurity trends and best practices.

 **Required Qualifications**

* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Security, or a related field. Master’s degree preferred.
* Extensive experience with Azure Cloud services and infrastructure management. Proven expertise in cybersecurity, including threat modelling, risk assessment, and incident response. Strong understanding of DevOps practices and tools. Hands-on experience with Kubernetes, Docker, and container orchestration. Experience with CI/CD pipeline development and management. Proficiency in monitoring tools and practices.
* In-depth knowledge of cloud security best practices. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Excellent leadership and team management abilities. Effective communication and interpersonal skills. Ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.
* Relevant certifications such as CISSP, CISM, Azure Security Engineer, or similar are highly desirable.

 **Preferred Skills**

* Experience with AI security, search indexes and Large Language Models (LLMs).
* Knowledge of compliance standards relevant to the legal industry (GDPR, ISO, etc).
* Previous experience in a senior security role within a tech or legal tech company.
* Familiarity with SQL, NoSQL and storage security measures.
* Experience with automation tools and scripting languages (e.g., Python, Terraform).

 **What We Offer**

* A young, motivated, and technology-driven team.
* Opportunities for professional growth and continuous learning.
* Flexible working hours and remote work options.
* A collaborative and supportive work environment.
* Competitive compensation and benefits package.

title: Chief Accountant & Financial Controller Consolidation for Volvo Energy AB and Volvo Energy
description:
Transport is at the core of modern society. Imagine using your expertise to shape sustainable transport and infrastructure solutions for the future? If you seek to make a difference on a global scale, working with next-gen technologies and the sharpest collaborative teams, then we could be a perfect match.

  

Financial Control & Accounting (FCA) is a part of Group Finance with the responsibility to secure that financial performance is correctly reflected for Business Areas, Truck Divisions, Group Functions and legal entities. FCA also provides local tax administration and compliance as well as global shared services through delivery centers in Accounting Services with quality focused and process efficient service deliveries. We are approximately 1.400 employees with a global footprint in 50+ countries closely integrated with local business operations. We always strive to develop and automate our processes and to further increase our role as key business partner. FCA drives quality and efficiency through lean optimization, digitalization, and offshoring.

**What you will do**
--------------------

  

If you are passionate about accounting, digitalization, working in project and are looking for the next professional step in a global environment, you may be our new Chief Accountant & Financial Controller Consolidation for Volvo Energy AB and Volvo Energy.

  

The role as Financial Controller Consolidation for Volvo Energy will have 2 major areas to focus on; one is the consolidation of Volvo Energy and the other will be the implementation of Elvira which is a major project to implement a cloud-based Master Finance platform within Volvo Group. In the position you will work with the consolidated operating income, operating capital and guide legal companies in their financial reporting process. In the role as Chief Accountant you are responsible for complete financial compliance for the legal company of Volvo Energy AB.

  

The position is based in Lundby, Gothenburg in the building CAMP X. You will work closely together with Business Control, Group Accounting, IT and other functions within Volvo Energy which will give you a broad understanding of the business and the operation.

  

In this role you will also be part of the GTT, VAS & VE accounting team at FCA and together with your team secure correct global as well as local accounting from both external as well as internal perspectives. You will drive and develop accounting and financial reporting processes for Volvo Energy, in close co-operation with Group Accounting and the CFO/Chief Controller function to secure proper and accurate closings. One key success factor, besides having a passion for accounting, is that you are a true team player and have good networking skills.

 **Your future team**

  

You will be joining a team with highly skilled colleagues with a positive and forward-leaning attitude. The job involves working in close collaboration with other Chief Accountants, Financial Controllers, Business Controllers, Group Accounting and other functions within Volvo Group which will give you a broad and valuable operation and business understanding. Based on this, you will have the opportunity to work with and learn more about additional areas of expertise which will enable you to build a great network within the Volvo Group.

**Who are you?**
----------------

  

To be successful in this position, you are positive, flexible, driven and you have a solution-oriented mindset. It is important that you are structured and well-organized and have excellent communication and interpersonal skills. You have a genuine interest in accounting combined with analytical skills and are looking to develop processes and digital ways of working. Of course, you have an owner mentality when it comes to analyzing the income statement and balance sheet for Volvo Energy.

  

Experience from multi-cultural and global finance operations is a plus. You need to be proficient in accounting and preferably also in consolidation as well as experience from working in projects.

 **Qualifications**

  

* University degree in Business Administration or similar education
* Minimum 5 years of advanced experience in the field of accounting. Experience from Big 4 is a plus.
* Experience from major projects in the finance community
* Willingness to drive harmonization and standardization of accounting processes
* Ability to lead the financial reporting activities and deliver financial analysis of closing outcome
* Enjoy functional leadership, working in teams and contributing to a positive atmosphere
* Interest in developing accounting/financial processes with new technology
* Fully proficient in written and spoken Swedish and English. No exceptions.
* Good knowledge of IFRS and local GAAP
**What’s in it for you?**
-------------------------

  

Working within the Volvo Group, you will be cared for and listened to, you will be able to design you own career, get rewarded for your contribution, work with the latest technologies, and you will contribute to leaving society in good shape for the next generation. You will become a part of a company culture based on our core values; Customer Success, Trust, Passion, Change and Performance.

**Ready for the next move?**
----------------------------

  

This position is based in Gothenburg, Sweden and requires occasional travel.

  

Last application date is 2024-12-22 but please send your application as soon as possible as we will review applications continuously.

 **For further information or questions, please contact:**

  

Anders Parsbäck, FCA Director GTT, VAS and VE, anders.parsback@volvo.com  

Cecilia Celestian, People & Culture Partner, cecilia.celestian@volvo.com

  

We look forward to your application!

  

We value your data privacy and therefore do not accept applications via mail.

 **Who we are and what we believe in**  

Our focus on Inclusion, Diversity, and Equity allows each of us the opportunity to bring our full authentic self to work and thrive by providing a safe and supportive environment, free of harassment and discrimination. We are committed to removing the barriers to entry, which is why we ask that even if you feel you may not meet every qualification on the job description, please apply and let us decide.

  

Applying to this job offers you the opportunity to join **Volvo Group**. Every day, across the globe, our trucks, buses, engines, construction equipment, financial services, and solutions make modern life possible. We are almost 100,000 people empowered to shape the future landscape of efficient, safe and sustainable transport solutions. Fulfilling our mission creates countless career opportunities for talents with sharp minds and passion across the group’s leading brands and entities.

 **Group Finance** contributes to realizing the vision of the Volvo Group by developing and providing a wide range of expert services from financial planning to accounting, business controlling, M&As, financial reporting and investor relations. With Volvo Group Finance you will be part of a global and diverse team of highly skilled professionals who work with passion, trust each other and embrace change to stay ahead. We make our customers win.
